alert.note: Alert for Blount (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 11:59AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM EST FOR SOUTHEASTERN KNOX...NORTHEASTERN BLOUNT...WEST CENTRAL JEFFERSON AND NORTHWESTERN SEVIER COUNTIES... At 1259 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Sevierville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Knoxville, Sevierville, Pigeon Forge, Strawberry Plains, Blaine, McMahan, Lake Forest, Mascot, Seymour and Kodak. This includes Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 392 and 408. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
